Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Westbound Reroute near Chicago/Halsted
ShortDescription: WB 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Halsted, Grand, Ashland & Chicago, due to street blockage near Chicago/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Halsted, Grand, Ashland, then resume their normal route on Chicago, due to street blockage near Chicago/Halsted.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
